title: ODI - Consequence and Risk Evaluation (CARE) Tool
description: Interactive tool for conducting consequence scanning of data and AI projects, with AI-assisted risk assessment, consequence identification, and mitigation planning.

title: ODI White Paper - Building a Better Future with Data and AI
description: Analysis of how inadequate data governance in AI training datasets poses safety, security, trust and ethical challenges, with recommendations for data assurance infrastructure.
category: Data Quality for AI - Research and Guidance

title: Nature Digital Medicine - The METRIC Framework for Assessing Data Quality for Trustworthy AI
description: Comprehensive framework with 15 awareness dimensions for assessing medical training data quality, reducing biases and increasing robustness in AI systems.
category: Data Quality for AI - Research and Guidance

title: Monte Carlo Data - Data Quality Framework Guide
description: Practical guide covering data quality dimensions (accuracy, completeness, timeliness, validity) with implementation roadmap and maturity assessment approaches.

title: Appen - Mastering AI Data Quality
description: Industry guide on data quality techniques for AI including label consistency, bias mitigation, and quality control frameworks for training data.

title: AIMultiple - Data Quality in AI: Challenges, Importance & Best Practices
description: Overview of data quality challenges in AI (GIGO problem, data poisoning, feedback loops) with governance frameworks and organizational best practices.

title: NuSocia - Navigating the AI Frontier: Non-Profit AI Maturity Framework
description: Five-stage maturity framework addressing resource constraints, data quality challenges, and impact measurement for mission-driven organizations.

title: Datagaps - Best Practices for Data Quality in AI
description: Technical guide on data governance frameworks, profiling, cleansing, continuous monitoring, and key quality metrics for AI projects.
